channel.title: Good Pluck Sounds
channel.description:
Through my time in using Auxy, I've discovered more and more uses for every sound. Since I seem to always see the same few sounds used for plucks, I thought I'd share some of my go to pluck sounds and combos. I'd love if you'd share yours too!
Climb, Atom, Pug, Puppy, etc. - The obvious ones
Doodle - Lowpass filter it to about 1/3, turn up shape for some color. Sounds best with some reverb. Nice deep pluck stab.
I'll add more as I find them.

item.title: Good Pluck Sounds
item.dc:creator: TC64
item.description:
Panda with Higher turned on + Maximum Pitch automation

For a great pad: Fragment- Turn shape knob all the way up

item.title: Good Pluck Sounds
item.dc:creator: blackocean
item.description:
jelly, 1/2 lowpass, full reverb and full delay on 1/4, 1/4 highpass, and a eentsy weentsy bit of shape

item.description:
Allen is awesome with some tone and reverb

item.title: Good Pluck Sounds
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
One good Pluck sound is otter on less than 1/4 filter
Penguin (higher) on low filter as well
